explanation: [0-0] A bright blue-green motorcycle with some English words printed on it is parked on the road. A man wearing a black short-sleeved shirt and red pants is standing in front of a house with a helmet in his hand. The exterior wall of the house behind him is brown with white windows.
[0-2] The man jogs to the motorcycle with the helmet.
[0-2] The man jogs to the motorcycle with the helmet.
[2-4] Then the man straddles the motorcycle, ready to put on his helmet when a woman in a bikini appears at the door of the house and shouts.

[4-8] Next, the man looks at the doorway, then back to the front and puts on his helmet. He bends over and grabs the handlebars of the motorcycle.
